div.h3: To provide the foundation and encouragement for all students to achieve their social, physical, and academic potential in a safe, nurturing, and positive environment.

div.class: dashboard-1 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: Evergreen Union School District is a three-school K-8 district located in northern Tehama County.

div.class: dashboard-2 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: Our hard-working staff is dedicated to continuing a legacy of excellence in a nurturing environment.

div.class: dashboard-3 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: Learn about the Evergreen Foundation, Parent Clubs, resources and more.
